descriptionHtml:
This version has ALL the proper .dds, and .nif files and it compleatly works on steam.
so there should be no issues with missing textures or meshes
ALL 3 staffs should be visable

ALSO AVAILABLE ON STEAM!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=16429

adds 3x staves to the game

Dragon Staff of Fire Domination
Dragon Staff of Ice Domination
Dragon Staff of Lightning Domination

These staffs have area effects that will send things flying.. I strongly recommend NOT using them inside your player houses, it will send clutter flying everywhere, or inside towns and cities.. You may damage one of the friendly NPCs. 

Unless you are intentionally trying to slaughter everyone in a friendly town, use them everywhere else. =P

each staff can be wielded in either hand so they can be duel wielded, or wielded with a spell, or other weapon.

This is a completely independent mod from my House mod... You do not need the house to use this one.

All 3 stave\'s are in a chest located on the roof section of Winterhold Collage, above the main entrance to the square. Enjoy!

If you find any problems with this mod please post a comment explaining the issue so I can fix it. And if you like this mod please add a comment I love any kind of feedback, almost as much as I love bob (some of you out there know what that means =P) And if you really love this mod please endorse it. 

Thank you
Jena Angela
aka Armaggeddon
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Updated - 16 MAR 2012 - v0.0.4

think I have all the textures working correctly now and the models should be visable
fixed some of the damage to the Ice and Lightning staffs.
author: Jena_Angela
